text: Lalton Kalan is a village in Ludhiana city. It is specially known for the people from Grewal caste. It is a village located in the Ludhiana South tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||970|| || |- | Population ||4,954||2,596||2,358 |- |} ==Villages in Ludhiana South Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana district
title: Lalton Kalan
